fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Banking and financial services

eu_initiatives: In the last 15 years we built a solid, consistent reputation, both at national and international level as reliable partner of Public Institutions, ACADs, HEIs and Research Centers, as well al Clusters and Large Associations, in the field of Tourism, Culture, Medical and ICT Research, Business Innovation, Dissemination and Communication of innovation results. X23 operates at the designing and management level, in many projects funded by the European Commission; in the same fields, our excellent reputation determines X23 to be frequently asked to cover management/coordination actions, also for groups and/or consortia which carry-out funds we are not direct beneficiary of. In the field of Venture Capital and private funds, we have an interesting role of influence in some process of scouting/expert-orientation to funding processes to SMEs, startups.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions

relevant_communication:
Cooperation with policy makers in Italy, UK, Estonia, e.g. for the project "Sintonicity" – as Blockchain Technology and protocol applied to BSFI, and Banking System. Cooperation with European and extra-EU LAMIC - Low and Middle Income Countries (e.g. Thailand, Uganda, Palestine), for medical facilities ICT-based settlement. 
 
Recently, X23 registered the EXOO23|Radical European trademark. The brand underpin the EXOO23|Radical programme, which can be described as follow:   
 
EXÓÔ23|Radical™ is the environment created by X23 – the “Innovation Bakery” (http://x-23.org) – providing a specific and multidisciplinary programme on innovation-led growth. Delivered by a pool of industry experts, mentors and coaches with specialty on scientific methodologies for companies to achieve their full potential, social innovators and creative minds, international tech-geeks and highly qualified technologists, talented people from successful start-ups and scale-ups, legal executives and IPR experts, economists and scientists — all together, we are committed in boosting your radical innovations. 
 
At EXÓÔ23|Radical™ we focus only on innovations never seen before, e.g. those having a very significant impact on society and the environment. In our view, success is a consequence; the point of departure lies in capacity of finding revolutionary solutions, the rest is in making them doable. Our planet evolution remains of the essence, while indispensable are our attentions to any ethical implications. 
 
By using a "mission-oriented"​ mechanism and a set of peer-validated methodologies, EXÓÔ23|Radical™ is actually performed in different projects at EU level. The scheme il replicable under certain licencing standard conditions. 
 
Services: we provide very innovative companies (SMEs / LIs / Start-ups / seeds), with a multi-tiered intense support made of 3 circular levels backed by mixed fund-raising campaings: "Root-23” (for seeds and newborn companies), "Grow-23"​ (specific to high-growht start-ups and SMEs, no matter how long they have been founded), and "Scale-23"​ (for fast track and very scaling-up process). For how it was meant, the circular EXÓÔ23|Radical™ programme is specifically designed to get radical companies off the ground! 
 
More info at https://x-23.org/exoo23 
Selections are performed quarterly, voluntary applications at: first@exoo23.net 
EXÓÔ23|Radical™ is a registered trademark for EU, all rigths reserved to X23 Srl
